programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep15
programme.desc: Scrambled Eggs/George Stephenson - Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Tug Of War Rope - It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won'T My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi'S Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep38
programme.desc: Scaretrux - Revvit and the Reptools are trapped by Scraptors and create a fake T-Truxto scare them away, only to then have Skrap-It attempt to steal it

Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery-It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies-Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game-Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.desc: Lagoon Lemonade-When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank-Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap-Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Floor is Lava-The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.desc: Runaway Rocket-When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dino Dash-Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It’s up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Amusement Parking Lot!-Beep beep! The Guppies love cars! But when Mr. Grouper's car breaks down on the way to an amusement park, will the kids figure out how to get this field trip rolling again?

programme.desc: Whale - Dee encourages a friend to say 'whale' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We meet lots of different whales. We see swimming whales, splashing whales and even a singing whale!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep57
programme.desc: The Big Picture - A young artist on the way up needs help to reach the top... of the wall he is painting.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: It's time to go to the hairdressers - JoJo learns how fun the hairdresser's can be when she goes with Gran Gran for a trim. After helping the hairdresser, JoJo also gets her own new style ready for Ezra's party!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Big and Small - Monty is struggling to make a huge gift for Jimmy Jones and starts to wonder if the best things might come in small packages.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: The Good Winner - Jeanie gets mad when she doesn't win a game, leaving Monty wondering whether you can turn a sore loser into a good loser.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Rainforests of Sumatra, Indonesia - Can the Go Jetters save the world's stinkiest plant from becoming Glitch's latest perfume?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Bonneville Salt Flats, USA - Xuli and Glitch go head to head as they try to beat the Go Jet Academy land speed record.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Mount Mumandad - Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Epidexipteryx & Tail Feather - Andy heads 160 million years into the past in search of a feather belonging to a tiny prehistoric dinosaur, but he is left stranded in the tree tops after encountering a meat-eating dinosaur.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Snow Machines - Rally driver Catie shows off three amazing machines that move on snow! She drives a snowmobile, shows us lots of amazing snow blowers and then drives up a mountain in a snow groomer.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: Sandcastles - Today's Swashbucklers, Peter, Faye, Stephen and Halema, take on the Stepping Stones and Bouncy Sails in pursuit of Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: The Matterhorn, Italy and Switzerland - Glitch gets into a mountain of trouble as the Go Jetters attempt to climb the Matterhorn.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Petra, Jordan - Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep17
programme.desc: Welcome Stafford - Spencer is on Sodor and is given the task of showing the new electric shunting engine, Stafford, around. Spencer puffs into Knapford station where he boasts to Thomas about his special task.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep13
programme.desc: Moon Bow - Rainbow gets to experience the night for the first time.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: Fluff Bread - Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: Too Hot - It's too hot for Nelly and Nora, if only they could make it rain...

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Thunder Completely Does Not Scare Me - Is there a big hungry giant up in the sky with a rumbly tummy? Or is the sky going to falling down? Lola really doesn't like thunder.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: The Thing That Danced - A huge dinopaw blocks the friends' way into wiggly canyon, and won't let them pass until they learn a dance.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Sleep - The friends find a fun slide to play on, only to realise that it is in fact a sleeping dinopaw!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Cinema - Annie decides this is the Halloween her and her friends will find the legendary, abandoned movie theater, with an entire snack counter filled with untouched candy. But Pony's fear of scary things threatens to ruin Annie's plans.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep207
programme.desc: For Wheeler / Brickmuda Heptagon - When Rooky discovers it's Chief Wheeler's birthday, she is determined to make it a memorable. // During the dedication ceremony of the city's deep sea vessel to honor Duke, Freya and Harl, the ship is accidentally set adrift.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Quacken / The Treasure of Nosepatch - When the mythical ocean monster, the Quacken, is sighted off the coast, famed adventurer Jessica Sharpe vows to capture it. // Rooky and Grizzled go undercover aboard the Guardian of the Oceans in search of a lost pirate treasure.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Shack Magic - The Chipmunks find a shack that magically fills with toys and games, but is it magic or something more sinister?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore - When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: No Putts, No Glory - Alvin tricks Theodore into believing he's great at mini golf which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep107
programme.desc: Giant Squidward / No Nose Knows - When Squidward gets spritzed with plant growth spray, he becomes monstrously huge. // When Patrick realizes that he is the only one out of all his friends without a nose, he decides he needs to get a nose, too.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Twin It to Win It - Captain Man makes twin superheroes, ShoutOut and AWOL, compete over who can catch more criminals using their own ways of crime-fighting.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep105
programme.desc: King Roydas - Inspired after hearing the Myth of King Midas, Roy wishes that everything he touched turned to gold despite Viv's objections. When his 'Roydas Touch' inevitably goes awry, Roy is determined to both save the day and prove his wish was still perfect.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Weather Beaten - A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Bummer Camp - When Gramps struggles to run Camp Mastadon, the kids come to his rescue.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Sleepstakes - The Loud kids help Lana get over her fear of sleepovers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Starstruck - Even with the guidance of their hologram advisor Janeway, the crew of The Protostar is tested when their ship is on a dangerous cosmic collision course.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep196
programme.desc: The Fishbowl / Married to Money - Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick’s behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton’s advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved…money!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep197
programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Suite and Sour / Back in Black - After Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort, they decide to take the kids - but only because they promised to behave. // When Lucy gets a crush on a 'regular and normal' boy, her sisters give her a makeover.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep208
programme.desc: No Such Luck / Frog Wild - The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities. // When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Useful / Stompy! - Annie is worried that Dad will see Pony as useless to the farm and get rid of him. // Annie is set to play in the soccer game, but when she gets between Pony and Dog in a fight Pony accidentally stomps on her foot.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Delivery Pony / Magic Annie - Annie and Pony want to deliver produce to their customers, but their new business is threatened by a big corporation. // Annie needs to find the perfect Mother's Day gift. Pony's convinced that Annie's magic trick is just the thing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep29
programme.desc: Survival of the Idiots / Dumped - SpongeBob and Pat are fascinated by the snow they see inside the Treedome and want to play in it, but sandy is hibernating for the winter. // SpongeBob grows more and more jealous as Gary spends more time with Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep30
programme.desc: No Free Rides / I'm Your Biggest Fanatic - SpongeBob attempts and fails his driving test again, but a fed up Ms. Puff wants him out of her classroom so she makes up extra credit for him so he can pass the test. // SpongeBob tries to join an exclusive jellyfishing club.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep31
programme.desc: MermaidMan and Barnacle Boy III / Squirrel Jokes - When Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy go away for the weekend, they ask SpongeBob and Pat to house sit for them. // SpongeBob becomes an overnight stand up comedy sensation when he starts telling derogatory jokes about squirrels.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep32
programme.desc: Pressure / The Smoking Peanut - Sandy and SpongeBob get into a fierce competition doing extreme underwater sports. // SpongeBob and Pat visit the zoo and SpongeBob innocently tosses a peanut at an oyster in order to rouse it. The oyster then goes crazy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Bitter Work - When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Roger Dodger - The rats have been terrorizing Roger the alligator. He asks the penguins for help. Their solution: switch Roger's brain with Rico's, and let the but kicking begin!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Skorca! / Tagged - On watch-duty, Private sees a terrifying Skorka: a sky orca whale. No one believes it exists, so Private sets out to battle the Sorka on his own. // When the penguins are interrupted mid-operation by a nosey scientist, they leave the zoo in danger.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep116
programme.desc: What Goes Around / Mask of the Raccoon - A little girl loses her doll at the zoo, and Rico gives up his own doll to replace it. Private assures Rico that his good deed will come back to him. // When a raccoon shows up and starts stealing from the zoo animals, the penguins jump into action.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Big Screen Buhdeuce / Weekend at Furfle's - Buhdeuce is lured away from Breadwinning by the glitz and glamour of being a movie star. // When Mrs. Furfle falls into a deep magical sleep, SwaySway and Buhdeuce pretend she's awake so she won't miss her big date with T-Midi.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Come Together - Brendar comes face to face with Alvin the demon, and with the help of her friends, defeats Alvin once and for all. Brendar discovers that she is the next rightful queen, which means she can no longer do what she loves, like questing.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dorg Wants to Bounce / Dorg and the Heatwave - A jealous Dorg steal his sister's Jumpsy Boots, only to have a garbage truck pick them up and drive away! // Dorg and the gang cast a spell to cool things down during a heatwave.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Rudy Awakening / Bound to Be Friends - It's Eggtober and Rudy is scared everyone will discover he's lying about being related to the Easter Bunny. // Felicity and Miguel are stuck together by magical friendship bracelets that will only unlock if they prove they're really best friends.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Serpentco / Chrome Dome - The dudes go undercover with Tufflips to investigate a crime ring that’s pirating action hero’s movies. // Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the top of a lawyer’s head from a roadside billboard advertisement.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Ollie Dogs / Camp Magna - Ollie offers a monster realm condiment for his hot dog stand, accidentally causing weird side effects. // Ollie and his classmates go on a camping trip. Ollie uses the pack to avoid roughing it, attracting Andre and Bev.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Separation Anxiety / Strings Attached - Fanboy and Chum Chum's inane disruptions finally push their teacher, Mr. Mufflin, to lay down the law and separate their desks. // After one bad deed too many, Fanboy is turned into a wooden boy as punishment by a fairy.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Snappy Campers / Lucky Duck - Dudley and Kitty go undercover as campers at Camp Itchyowiebooboo to empede Snaptrap's "evil" plan. // Dudley's favorite TV host attempts to destroy television to avenge the cancellation of his show.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Battle for the Infinite Ocean - The time has come to bring Tritannus and Icy down. An epic battle ensues with all of the planets' forces uniting as one. Bloom and the Winx must stop Tritannus before he activates the Emperor's throne. But will it be too late?

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep526
programme.desc: The End of Tritannus - Tritannus has his cousin, Aisha, in his clutches. She is a critical part of his plan for dimension domination. Could evil possibly prevail?

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Stuck on You / Al Be Back - After an unfortunate "glue" accident, the Turtles have to fight a whole host of villains. // The Turtles' first public musical gig is interrupted by Albearto and his animatronic army.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep157
programme.desc: Squidward's School for Grown Ups / Oral Report - When Pat suddenly grows a very grown-up beard, he decides it’s time to act like a grown-up, too. // While preparing to give an oral report for boating school, SpongeBob realizes that he’s got a horrible case of stage fright.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Zeela The Great - Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Davey Boy - Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell / The Stinkhole Chronicles - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly. // Parker and Lily go on a quest through Old Stinkhole to rescue Angus.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep165
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Justin continues to make amends. Can Roo bridge the gap between Alf and Kieran? Will Christian be able to win Tori back?

programme.title: Planet America Ep1
programme.desc: Chas and John are back for the midterm elections. Is Donald Trump going to launch his bid for 2024? Will the Democrats lose the House as predicted? We hear from leading pollsters who have the inside line on how it's tracking.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep32
programme.desc: Paul Barry turns the spotlight onto those who 'make the news': the reporters, online editors, producers, camera operators and photographers, plus PR consultants, media agencies, spin-doctors, lobbyists and social influencers.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep32
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep173
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep188
programme.desc: Bringing you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and international news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Drum Ep173
programme.desc: In this ever-changing world, turn to Ellen Fanning and a panel of informed minds for forthright and insightful conversations on the day's news, big issues, local topics and unique personal insights on the issues that matter.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep155
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep193
programme.desc: Karina Carvalho brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: The Business Ep139
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep193
programme.desc: Australia's most trusted source of independent news, ABC News connects Australians with the latest news, original reporting, reliable information and analysis to keep you informed and up-to-date. Presented by Manny Tsigas.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep21
